<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Configuración de Virtual Servers Citrix ">3105d62cdb7573002ca60d53ca961963</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:9f74c455db4e73002ca60d53ca9619a3</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>OcultarNumeroServidores</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	var tipoSolicitud = g_form.getValue('tipo_de_solicitud');
	//n_mero_de_servidores_a_eliminar
	//n_mero_de_servidores_a_Habilitar
	if(tipoSolicitud == 'Modificar Virtual Servers'){

		g_form.setDisplay('n_mero_de_servidores_a_eliminar',false);
		g_form.setMandatory('n_mero_de_servidores_a_eliminar',false);
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>114190586</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-09-05 20:50:08</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e624d8d81bf3b7002ad798aebd4bcb84</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OcultarNumeroServidores</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BCR_APP" source="x_287988_bcr_app">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BCR_APP">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e624d8d81bf3b7002ad798aebd4bcb84</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-19 21:58:53</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
